ygData.subject: Re: spell question
ygData.msgSnippet: 1 word,  Retribution.    Dmg at level 44 is about 502.   I know a level 50 cleric who is doing 550 damage now.  (this spell was reduced recently, it used to do
ygData.messageBody:
1 word, Retribution. Dmg at level 44 is about 502. I know a level 50
cleric who is doing 550 damage now. (this spell was reduced recently, it
used to do more damage.)


Mr. J Daniels


> Second - I am level 34. Anyone level 39 or higher have information on
> any additional DD spells that cleric will receive above wrath in damage
> amount that are NOT only for use on undead?? Specifically the amount
> of damage that any future spells will do.
>
> Thanks!! :)
>
> Sirensa
> Cleric questing for knowledge...
